{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=R3010UW(AP) |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/23/2002 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=LNQR3010UW |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Virata |cpu1_model=Helium 210-80 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit),USB 1.1 (slave) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=schematics |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=ACTIONTEC |default_ssid_regex=^ACTIONTEC$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''11 Mbps (802.11b) Wireless Access Point''
[http://www.actiontec.com/products/product.php?pid=98 Product page]
[http://support.actiontec.com/doc_files/R3010UW(AP)_11b_Wireless_Access_Point_User_Manual.pdf Manual] This FCC ID covers two devices... *R3010UW (''Wireless Cable/DSL Router''), filed 01/14/2002 **1x LAN, 1x WAN, internal PCMCIA for wireless module, external PCMCIA **'''RENO_JR''' *R3010UW(AP) (''802.11b Access Point''), via C2PC filed 05/23/2002 **1x LAN, internal PCMCIA for wireless module **'''APTOS''' 10/100 LAN (w/ integrated SoC MAC+PHY) Per the manual, the default SSID is '''ACTIONTEC'''.
